CriticalFieldNotes: Grand historic hotel at 500 South Main Street with exceptional lobby workspace. Elegant Lobby Lounge features artisan coffee, freshly baked pastries, and refined ambiance perfect for focused work. Free WiFi throughout property. 5 minutes from Temple Square and close to downtown business district. 22 meeting rooms available. Classic American hospitality with modern amenities. One of the best hotel lobbies for remote work in Utah.
